Plot: Fact-based recounting of a group of women who are imprisoned on the island of Sumatra by the Japanese during World War II and used music as a relief to their misery.
Title: Paradise Road
Writer: David Giles (story), Martin Meader (story), Bruce Beresford, Betty Jeffrey (diaries)
Actors: Glenn Close, Frances McDormand, Pauline Collins, Cate Blanchett
